meanings.definition: The state or quality of being subconscious.
meanings.sent1: Her subconsciousnesses often reveal hidden desires.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study subconsciousnesses to understand the mind better.
meanings.sent3: His subconsciousnesses seem to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: The artist's subconsciousnesses painted vivid dreams on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: Exploring your subconsciousnesses can lead to self-discovery.

meanings.definition: The mental processes occurring outside of conscious awareness.
meanings.sent1: The brain's subconsciousnesses control many automatic functions.
meanings.sent2: Psychologists study subconsciousnesses to understand behavior.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes our subconsciousnesses play tricks on us.
meanings.sent4: The subconsciousnesses are like hidden gears in a clock, always turning.
meanings.sent5: Unlocking the power of your subconsciousnesses can change your life.
